page.title: 11EDUCATION
page.content:
This block contains the two secondary schools for the Abertillery distict, three infant schools,one primary school and one junior school.A{new {comprehensive school}to replace the present two is being built on reclaimed colliery land in{Cwmtillery.
The system of schooling in current use is infant schooling from 'rising five' to seven,junior school from seven to eleven and then junior comprehensive to the age of fourteen.After this the pupils must travel to Nantyglo to attend the senior comprehensive school. The new comprehensive will replace the Roseheyworth and Gelli Crug comprehensives and the latter will become a primary school.This will then release the present primary school for redevelopment.
